ComicInfo.Series: Lady Mechanika: The Tablet of Destinies
ComicInfo.Summary:
Lady Mechanika and Winifred travel deep into the heart of the Congo Jungle in their continued search for Winifred's missing grandfather, but discover that they were not the sole survivors of the airship explosion which left them stranded in the African desert.
*List of covers and their creators:* Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | ----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- A | Direct Edition | Joe Benitez, Martin Montiel & Marc Garcia | 1 | B | Direct Edition | Joe Benitez & Peter Steigerwald | 5 | C | Retailer Incentive | Joe Benitez & Martin Montiel | 4 | D | JoeBenitez.com Online Exclusive (Limited to 500 copies) | Joe Benitez & Sabine Rich | 3 | E | BlueRainbow Exclusive (Limited to 500 copies) | Dawn McTeigue & Ula Mos | Missing | W | White Edition (Limited to 250 copies) | Joe Benitez | 2 | Note: Covers are lettered (A-Z) according to JoeBenitez.com.
